Primary Contact: David Greenshields, Regional Professional Practice Leader
Service Details: - Provides a support program for children who have an adult family member living with cancer - Offers expressive art activities in a supportive environment where children can meet with each other and learn about cancer and its treatment - Offers a support group for parents at the same time - Also offers the interactive online resource program, Cancer in My Family:  My Anything But Ordinary Journey
Address & Map: BC Cancer Agency, Sindi Ahluwalia Hawkins Centre for the Southern Interior399 Royal AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 5L3
